br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber

Class ServiceConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber.ServiceConnection

  • public class ServiceConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides means to communicate with a SiNoS Service in order to listen situation nofitications.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceConnection(java.lang.String host, int port)
      Connects to the SiNoS Service that is available in the specified host and port.
      ServiceConnection(java.lang.String host, int port, java.util.logging.Level logLevel)
      Connects to the SiNoS Service that is available in the specified host and port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceConnection

        public ServiceConnection(java.lang.String host,
                 int port)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Connects to the SiNoS Service that is available in the specified host and port. Log level is initialized as SEVERE.
        Parameters:
        host - Address (URL or IP) of the SiNoS Service.
        port - Port number of the SiNoS Service.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Indicates the occurrence of a communication-related exception during the execution of this remote method call.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Indicates that there is no event channel running in the provided host.

      • ServiceConnection

        public ServiceConnection(java.lang.String host,
                 int port,
                 java.util.logging.Level logLevel)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Connects to the SiNoS Service that is available in the specified host and port.
        Parameters:
        host - Address (URL or IP) of the SiNoS Service.
        port - Port number of the SiNoS Service.
        logLevel - Level of logger output (SEVERE = errors and exceptions; WARNING = warnings and exceptions; INFO = debug-level output).
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Indicates the occurrence of a communication-related exception during the execution of this remote method call.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Indicates that there is no event channel running in the provided host.

      • subscribe

        public <T extends br.ufes.inf.lprm.situation.SituationType> void subscribe(SituationListener<T> listener)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method subscribes a listener in the connected SiNoS Service.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be subscribed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Indicates the occurrence of a communication-related exception during the execution of this remote method call.

      • unsubscribe

        public <T extends br.ufes.inf.lprm.situation.SituationType> void unsubscribe(SituationListener<T> listener,
                                                                    NotificationType notificationType)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method disables/unsubscribes a specific notification type of a listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that contains the notification type that will be disabled.
        notificationType - The type of notification to be disabled.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Indicates the occurrence of a communication-related exception during the execution of this remote method call.
